interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
Review Date: 2020/08/23
Store: PURELEOR
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'}
Review Text: I have just started to delve into the world of false lashes.  I am by no means an expert, and still am not sure which look I prefer.  This brand, with the eyeliner, is one that I find among the easier to apply.  I think I may have to trim them, and I sometimes have issues on the outside corner with keeping it in place, but they flatter my eyes well.
Review Title: Eyelash beginner
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
UV LED Nail Lamp 120W High Power Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish with 4 Timer Setting 42 gel Light,Professional Auto Sensor Nail Light for Fingernail,Toenail,Home,Salon
LWQIONG
{'Brand': 'LWQIONG', 'Special Feature': 'Motion Sensor', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Plastic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Room Type': 'Office'}
I used this to put on my first set of polygel nails.  It was super easy to use and did the job as I expected it would.  The auto function was extremely handy, as was the ability to time it if I wanted.
Did the job as expected
Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
AIFAIFA
{'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit. I already had a UV lamp, but I like this one better.  It is more compact and seems to work a little better. I love the polish, and all of the nail art. It is so much easier than normal polish.  I am by no means an expert, but the poly gel is the only thing that did not work for me.  I could not get it to cure.  Even after the full polish it still felt like it could crumble off at any moment.  I only did by thumbs, pinkies, and ring fingers, and the gel was broken on all of them in a couple of days.  It seemed to last a little longer on the nails I did polish as well (my thumbs).  For one day they might be okay.  But the rest of the kit makes it worth it.
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit

I have just started to delve into the world of false lashes.  I am by no means an expert, and still am not sure which look I prefer.  This brand, with the eyeliner, is one that I find among the easier to apply.  I think I may have to trim them, and I sometimes have issues on the outside corner with keeping it in place, but they flatter my eyes well.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference**: The user has continued to expand their interest beyond nail care to include false lashes, particularly appreciating versatile solutions for enhancing their beauty routine. Their focus remains on products that offer both functionality and variety.

- **Ease of Use**: The user values convenience and ease of application across all beauty products, highlighting a preference for user-friendly solutions. They appreciate tools that simplify the process, whether for nails or lashes.

- **Quality and Performance**: While the user has a positive outlook on performance, they show a willingness to adapt as they explore new categories. Although they appreciate reliable performance, minor issues seem acceptable if the overall usage experience remains enjoyable.

- **Flexibility in Use**: Retaining a preference for products suitable for both personal and professional contexts, they express interest in products that enhance their beauty regimen while enabling them to provide beauty services.

- **Material Awareness**: The user remains conscious about the materials used in beauty products, including durability and functionality. Their evaluations reflect a focus on both appearance and performance, ensuring they choose quality items for their routines.

Overall, the user is embracing a broader beauty interest, seeking effective, convenient, and aesthetically pleasing solutions that balance personal enjoyment and performance while remaining open to experimentation with new products and techniques.
